oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "I Am Neutral"
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Fred Wright
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Bosses, Other Unions
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Boss and James Carey singing behind a banner claiming the company's neutrality in National Labor Relations Board elections.
